Title: Hotel Management System
ImgAlt: A image of the hotel management application
About: The Hotel Booking System is a minimal web-based application that allows users to search and book. It provides an Razor Pages web interface for customers to book available rooms and an desktop application for hotel staff to perform booking validation and check-in.
Challenges: The main challenges included designing an efficient booking workflow, synchronizing data between the web and desktop apps, and handling booking conflicts. Optimizing database queries with Dapper.

Title: Shaheem's Portfolio
ImgAlt: A image of the My personal Site
About: I developed a responsive portfolio website to present my projects and skills in a professional way. The site includes a home page, work showcase, and contact section.
Challenges: One of the main challenges was making the portfolio and work item pages dynamic. Instead of using backend APIs, I structured the data in JSON files and loaded them at runtime, which taught me how to manage content dynamically. I also built a flexible navigation system with items loading from JSON, ensuring easier updates and scalability. Another challenge was maintaining responsiveness and consistent styling across devices, which improved my understanding of layout and design practices.
